## [A very simple shiny app](https://ignacio.shinyapps.io/shiny_vizdraws/)

```{r setup, eval=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(vizdraws)

ui <- fluidPage(# Application title
  titlePanel("vizdraws"),
  
  fluidRow(vizdrawsOutput('chart')))

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$chart <- rendervizdraws({
    vizdraws(
      prior = "N(0,1)",
      posterior = rnorm(1000, mean = 0.2, sd = 0.1),
      MME = 0.1,
      threshold = 0.7,
      display_mode_name = TRUE,
      title = "Shiny Example"
    )
  })
}

# Run the application
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
